official_title: A bill to amend the Act of August 24, 1935 (commonly referred to as the Miller Act) to provide for additional protection to persons supplying labor and material in the prosecution of work provided for in contracts for the construction alteration, or repair of any public building or public work of the United States, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Act requiring bonds of contractors for public buildings or public works ("the Miller Act") to require bonds in an amount satisfactory to the Federal officer awarding the contract to protect all persons supplying labor and materials.
